about_the_game:
Outfits are alternate looks for your Champions that you can swap in and out whenever you want! Minsc has been known to dress up as his favourite hero, Boo, whenever he visits sick kids at the local temples.

In this pack:

  • Outfit: Minsc's Giant Boo Costume
  • 5 Gold Chests
  • 3 Supply Chests
  • 1 Potion of Polish
